item.description: Knockdown - Brush Fire; INC#1187; 03:44PM; Radio Hill; MAP: https://bit.ly/radiohill; #ElysianPark; 40 LAFD Firefighters, responding by ground and air, took just 49 minutes to contain flames to less than one (1) acre of light grass and brush north of the radio towers. No injury. No structures. No evacuation. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC11 BC2 E1 E202 E203 E212 E250 E290 E4 E44 E47 E90 EM2 H1 H3 H6 HA1 HA3 HA6 RA47 RA90 T12 T2 T3 T90; CH7; 14; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1187; 02:52PM; Radio Hill ; MAP: https://bit.ly/radiohill; #ElysianPark; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to three-quarter (0.75) acre light grass burning north of the radio towers. No structure threat. No evacuation.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC11 BC2 E1 E202 E203 E212 E250 E290 E4 E44 E47 EM2 H1 H3 H6 HA1 HA3 HA6 RA47 RA90 T12 T2 T3 T90; CH5; 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0332; 06:39AM; 2435 S Sepulveda Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KUtrQj; #Sawtelle; First arriving 40 LAFD Firefighters took just 20 minutes (6:59 AM) to access, confine and fully extinguish a kitchen fire held-in-check by fire sprinklers within one apartment unit on the 6th floor of a 13 story apartment building. No injury. Crews will remain on scene to assist with smoke removal and salvage. Fire cause yet to be determined.; FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC4 BC9 E237 E263 E292 E37 E43 E59 E62 RA59 T37 T63 T92; CH9; 15; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0230; 04:41AM; 150 N Carondelet St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3utybWB; #Westlake; It took 38 firefighters 22 minutes to access, confine, and fully extinguish the flames in the abandoned two-story home. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under active investigation.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM22 E1 E13 E202 E203 E220 E227 E235 E250 E27 E3 E56 E6 EA1 EM11 HR3 RA20 RA27 RA827 T2 T20 T27 T3 T35 T50 UR27 UR88; CH7; 14 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0230; 04:19AM; 2428 W Council St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3x2jJ8w; #Westlake; Two-story craftsman home (vacant/boarded-up) with heavy fire showing.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 E1 E202 E203 E220 E3 E6 RA20 T2 T20 T3; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0130; 03:45AM; 603 S Mariposa Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3eskVM2; #Koreatown; After a combination of defensive and offensive operations, firefighters have extinguished all active flame in the structure in 89 minutes. Firefighters will remain on scene for an extended period of time to ensure all smoldering debris and remaining hot spots are eliminated. The scene remains an active investigation.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E203 E210 E211 E220 E226 E229 E261 E29 E3 E52 E6 EA1 EM11 HR3 PH1 RA11 RA29 RA3 RA803 T10 T11 T20 T26 T29 T3 T61 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0130; 02:16AM; 603 S Mariposa Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3eskVM2; #Koreatown; Firefighters (88 personnel) are in defensive mode battling a small two-story commercial with fire through the roof (at the same location as last night's incident 1853). LAFD Arson Investigators are responding.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E203 E210 E211 E220 E226 E229 E261 E29 E3 E52 E6 EA1 EM11 HR3 PH1 RA11 RA29 RA3 RA803 T10 T11 T20 T26 T29 T3 T61 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1853; 09:19PM; 603 S Mariposa Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3eskVM2; #Koreatown; Sixty LAFD firefighters responded to the (corrected) small two-story commercial building where fire burned part of both the first and second floors. Through a well-coordinated attack, firefighters extinguished the flames in 26 minutes, without injury. The cause is under active investigation.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E203 E211 E220 E226 E229 E26 E27 E29 E6 EA1 EM11 HR3 RA11 RA3 RA803 T11 T20 T26 T29 T3 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1854; 09:08PM; 16352 W Horace St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RM1fRT; #GranadaHills; Twenty-four firefighters responded for a well-coordinated attack that took just 15 minutes to access, confine, and fully extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. ; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E18 E275 E287 E87 RA87 T75 T87; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1854; 08:53PM; 16352 W Horace St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RM1fRT; #GranadaHills; Two-story single-family home with fire showing from the rear. Offensive mode.; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E18 E275 E287 E87 RA87 T75 T87; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange
